column1: in memory of dorothy j. west -- w. e. autenrith sons| dorothy j. west. october 4
column6: 2015. place of death: town of kirkland
column7: ny memorial donations. memorial donations can be made to: the siegenthaler center c/o hospice and palliative care
column8: inc. envelopes are available at the funeral home. biographynewport dorothy j. dottie west
column13: new hartford. mrs. west was born on october 4
column15: a daughter of the late frederick and dora (edick) hyde. she graduated from mohawk high school in 1953. on june 16
column17: she was united in marriage with robert e. west at the mohawk reformed church. dottie was a self-employed seamstress and cake baker for most of her life until retiring. she was a former member of the mohawk reformed church and a member of the former middleville memorial post #7220 v. f. w. auxiliary. survivors besides her husband of 59 years
column20: barbara herkel of fl; a grandson
column22: nephews and cousins. dorothy was predeceased by two daughters
column23: lisa givens in 1996 and susan west in 2008; and a sister
column24: beverly hovey. funeral services will be held at the autenrith funeral home
column26: on friday at 10:00 a. m. with the rev. matthew ripp
column27: pastor of the first baptist church of newport
column28: officiating. interment will follow in the mohawk cemetery. calling hours at the funeral home are thursday from 5 to 7 p. m. memorials may be made to the siegenthaler center c/o hospice and palliative care
column29: inc. envelopes are available at the funeral home.
